boardgame.name: Fallen
boardgame.description: Fallen is a two-player card and dice game with fast and challenging game play, gorgeous art, and plenty of re-playability all wrapped up in an ever-changing story._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One player chooses a Hero to delve deep within a dungeon, seeking the ultimate evil that waits below. Play as Seroth the Pit Fighter and fight to win at any cost, Merace the Sorceress and cast devastating spells, or Ranek the Thief striking from the shadows._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every Hero comes with a unique character card depicting the hero and the special abilities and proficiencies of that particular character. Each hero also comes with nine unique skills to choose from which are divided into three skill trees catering to a particular proficiency. Ten signature Power cards also come with each hero, giving them special abilities that are themed to their style of play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The second player takes on the role of the Dungeon Lord, summoning vile creatures and ancient spells to defeat the Hero. Play as the Archivist of Souls weaving dark spells that plague the hero, the Forge Master, part wizard and part machine, filling the dungeon corridors with horribly augmented monstrosities, or as Krogarn the Ogre king sending your primal horde and spirit magic to hunt down the adventurer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Similar to the Hero, the Dungeon Lord has a character card that depicts the chosen form as well as showing the special abilities used by that character. In addition, ten signature Power cards come with each Dungeon Lord that are specific to style of villainy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Unique Story cards bring the dungeons of Fallen to life. These cards deliver an immersive dungeon experience for players new to gaming, yet have deeper mechanics to keep even die-hard players on their toes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After adventuring through the dungeon, the Hero and Dungeon Lord clash in an epic battle between good and evil. The challenges are fast and furious as cards are played and custom dice are rolled._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the game of Fallen._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Featuring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Play as one of three legendary Heroes OR play as one of three sinister Dungeon Lords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Custom dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Story cards that drive the action_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Customizable Heroes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- A full dungeon experience in 90 minutes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter version, will ship to you immediately after I receive it. The Adventurer level, plus all stretch goals: [q](Adventurer) Get one boxed game of Fallen + the Digital Art Book + All Stretch Goals.[/q] There are a ton of stretch goals (see updates here: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/572306505/fallen-4). I ask that you pay for the game now to hold your copy and pay for actual shipping once we know what it is (probably $12.35 in the US).
Includes C3K Reserved for LunarSoundDesign
Reserved for Dave chase

FALLEN Core Game KS ED. + ALL 4 KICKSTARTER ADVENTURE PACKS Watchtower Games NEW You are buying: OVER DOUBLE THE GAME CONTENT (THE VERSION HERE) VS. RETAIL BASE/CORE SET (WITHOUT EXCLUSIVES AND WITHOUT THE 4 LIMITED ADVENTURE PACKS! BUYING THE RETAIL VERSION IS JUST LAME) THE EXTREMELY RARE, HARD-TO-FIND, BRAND NEW AND SEALED, 2014 KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION Card/CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE/ DUNGEONS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; DRAGONS Game: FALLEN - THE CORE BOARD GAME KICKSTARTER EDITION _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALL 4 ADVENTURE EXPANSION LIMITED KICKSTARTER SETS FOR FALLEN - The Board gameby WatchTower Games GAME OVERVIEW: Fallen is a two-player card and dice game with fast and challenging game play, gorgeous art, and plenty of re-playability all wrapped up in an ever-changing story. One player chooses a Hero to delve deep within a dungeon, seeking the ultimate evil that waits below. Play as Seroth the Pit Fighter and fight to win at any cost, Merace the Sorceress and cast devastating spells, or Ranek the Thief striking from the shadows. Every Hero comes with a unique character card depicting the hero and the special abilities and proficiencies of that particular character. Each hero also comes with nine unique skills to choose from which are divided into three skill trees catering to a particular proficiency. Ten signature Power cards also come with each hero, giving them special abilities that are themed to their style of play. The second player takes on the role of the Dungeon Lord, summoning vile creatures and ancient spells to defeat the Hero. Play as the Archivist of Souls weaving dark spells that plague the hero, the Forge Master, part wizard and part machine, filling the dungeon corridors with horribly augmented monstrosities, or as Krogarn the Ogre king sending your primal horde and spirit magic to hunt down the adventurer. Similar to the Hero, the Dungeon Lord has a character card that depicts the chosen form as well as showing the special abilities used by that character. In addition, ten signature Power cards come with each Dungeon Lord that are specific to style of villainy. Unique Story cards bring the dungeons of Fallen to life. These cards deliver an immersive dungeon experience for players new to gaming, yet have deeper mechanics to keep even die-hard players on their toes. After adventuring through the dungeon, the Hero and Dungeon Lord clash in an epic battle between good and evil. The challenges are fast and furious as cards are played and custom dice are rolled. This is the game of Fallen. Featuring - Play as one of three legendary Heroes OR play as one of three sinister Dungeon Lords - Custom dice - Story cards that drive the action - Customizable Heroes - A full dungeon experience in 90 minutes This RARE LIMITED EDITION KICKSTARTER version comes with the CORE GAME AND ALL THE EXTRAS/EXCLUSIVES IN THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN: FALLEN - THE CORE BOARD GAME with HUNDREDS OF EXTRA EXCLUSIVES/ STRETCH GOALS AND 4 ADVENTURE PACKS ARE: These are purely limited and already out of print after its first printing. CATACLYSM DARK TOWER UNDERWORLD RUINED STRONGHOLD Each one of these ADVENTURE EXPANSIONS come with 3 NEW HORRIFIC CREATURES, 2 NEW UNIQUE ITEMS, AND 12 AMAZING NEW STORY CARDS THAT ARE TOTALLY DIFFERENT FROM THE CORE/BASE GAME and will provide you with HOURS UPON HOURS OF ADDITIONAL GAME CONTENT! Wow! What cool EXCLUSIVES!!! BE ONE OF THE FEW PLAYERS TO OWN THESE EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER ADVENTURE PACKS FOR FALLEN OUTSIDE OF THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN THAT ENDED!!!

Excellent Condition. In Shrink. Kickstarter edition with KS Exclusives _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; bonuses. Adventurer KS pledge. http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/572306505/fallen-4 Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $15.00 Game IN-HAND and ready to ship.
Adventurer Level with all the kickstarter extra stuff - but not the adventurer packs

I have to liquidate my $135 pledge for the kickstarter version and a set of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;ancients_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; playmats. Watchtower Games will change the shipping information and ship directly. Please send me a private message if you are interested. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll entertain any offer. If you are outside the US I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to work with Watchtower Games on shipping options prior to any funds changing hands as this may result in additional fees.
Game: Fallen (Watchtower Games) Condition: New Language: English Kickstarter Edition with stretch-goals For information on payment, shipping or cancellation see below. Thanks for ordering!

Kickstarter edition game (Limited edition exclusives already bundled in core game box). Factory sealed. Does not include any paid addons. This set includes the 4 KS exclusive adventure expansion packs (all sealed). FALLEN - ALL 4 KICKSTARTER ADVENTURE PACKS! NEW/OUT OF PRINT! Watchtower Games You are buying: A EXTREMELY RARE, HARD-TO-FIND, BRAND NEW AND SEALED, ONLY 1 PRINTING MADE (GUARANTEED BY WATCHTOWER GAMES) of the 2014 KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION Card/CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE/ DUNGEONS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; DRAGONS Game: 4 SET ADVENTURE EXPANSION FOR FALLEN - The Board gameby WatchTower Games GAME OVERVIEW: Fallen is a two-player card and dice game with fast and challenging game play, gorgeous art, and plenty of re-playability all wrapped up in an ever-changing story. One player chooses a Hero to delve deep within a dungeon, seeking the ultimate evil that waits below. Play as Seroth the Pit Fighter and fight to win at any cost, Merace the Sorceress and cast devastating spells, or Ranek the Thief striking from the shadows. Every Hero comes with a unique character card depicting the hero and the special abilities and proficiencies of that particular character. Each hero also comes with nine unique skills to choose from which are divided into three skill trees catering to a particular proficiency. Ten signature Power cards also come with each hero, giving them special abilities that are themed to their style of play. The second player takes on the role of the Dungeon Lord, summoning vile creatures and ancient spells to defeat the Hero. Play as the Archivist of Souls weaving dark spells that plague the hero, the Forge Master, part wizard and part machine, filling the dungeon corridors with horribly augmented monstrosities, or as Krogarn the Ogre king sending your primal horde and spirit magic to hunt down the adventurer. Similar to the Hero, the Dungeon Lord has a character card that depicts the chosen form as well as showing the special abilities used by that character. In addition, ten signature Power cards come with each Dungeon Lord that are specific to style of villainy. Unique Story cards bring the dungeons of Fallen to life. These cards deliver an immersive dungeon experience for players new to gaming, yet have deeper mechanics to keep even die-hard players on their toes. After adventuring through the dungeon, the Hero and Dungeon Lord clash in an epic battle between good and evil. The challenges are fast and furious as cards are played and custom dice are rolled. This is the game of Fallen. Featuring - Play as one of three legendary Heroes OR play as one of three sinister Dungeon Lords - Custom dice - Story cards that drive the action - Customizable Heroes - A full dungeon experience in 90 minutes This RARE LIMITED EDITION KICKSTARTER version comes with these EXTRA/EXCLUSIVES: Please note that this does not include THE CORE BOX/ ORIGINAL GAME that these ADVENTURE PACKS need to play the game with. These are purely limited and already out of print after its first printing. 4 ADVENTURE PACKS ARE: CATACLYSM DARK TOWER UNDERWORLD RUINED STRONGHOLD Each one of these ADVENTURE EXPANSIONS come with 3 NEW HORRIFIC CREATURES, 2 NEW UNIQUE ITEMS, AND 12 AMAZING NEW STORY CARDS THAT ARE TOTALLY DIFFERENT FROM THE CORE/BASE GAME and will provide you with HOURS UPON HOURS OF ADDITIONAL GAME CONTENT! Wow! What cool EXCLUSIVES!!! BE ONE OF THE FEW PLAYERS TO OWN THESE EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER ADVENTURE PACKS FOR FALLEN OUTSIDE OF THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN THAT ENDED!!!
